sqlMap.sql:
SELECT T1.LIC_GRP_ID ,T1.LOG_USR_ID ,TO_CHAR(T1.LOG_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LOG_TIME /* 로그 일시 */ ,T1.LOG_IP ,T1.LOG_URL ,COALESCE(T2.USR_NM,'-') USR_NM ,T1.MENU_ID ,T1.MENU_NM ,T1.MENU_URL ,T1.MENU_CD FROM ADM5100 T1 INNER JOIN ADM2000 T2 ON (T1.LOG_USR_ID = T2.USR_ID AND T1.LIC_GRP_ID = T2.LIC_GRP_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND T1.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND T1.LIC_GRP_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTxt# || '%'
AND T1.LOG_USR_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTxt# || '%'
AND T1.LOG_IP LIKE '%'|| #searchTxt# || '%'
AND T2.USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTxt# || '%'
AND T1.MENU_CD = #searchCd#
AND T1.MENU_CD = #searchCd#
AND T1.LOG_TIME >= TO_DATE(#srchFromDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T1.LOG_TIME <= TO_DATE(#srchToDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
ORDER BY T1.LOG_TIME DESC
sqlMap.select: /*adm5100DAO.selectAdm5100ExcelList 시스템 사용 이력 로그 목록엑셀 을 조회한다.*/
sqlMap.insert: /* adm5100DAO.insertAdm5100SystemUseLog - 시스템 사용이력 쌓기 쌓기 */ INSERT INTO ADM5100 ( LIC_GRP_ID, LOG_TIME, LOG_URL, LOG_USR_ID, LOG_IP, MENU_ID, MENU_NM, MENU_URL, MENU_CD ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #logUrl#, #logUsrId#, #logIp#, #menuId#, #menuNm#, #menuUrl#, #menuCd# )
